document_data.name: The Mute Lute
document_data.mainbody: '''The Mute Lute''' was a shop located in [[Neverwinter]] in the 14{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Mute Lute was located in the northwestern end of the [[Blacklake District]], just across the street from [[Jaesor's Fineware Porcelain Works]], in the intersection between [[Hantor's Lane]] at the [[Street Of Storms]].{{cite web|author=[[Ed Greenwood]]|title=Ed's Twitter|url=https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/967970877538275328|accessdate=2018-02-24}}

Description.Prices: Common lutes at the Mute Lute cost 900 [[gp]], while custom-made lutes could cost up to 3000 gp.
